root.speaker: Sphere
root.message: Now, I take you to the land of no dimensions. A land of endless abyss, known only as pointland. Here, the only miserable creature is but a singular point, though in his own ignorance he has found much bliss. He percieves everything as his own, for he is all he knows. From him we can learn a valuable lesson,

choices.text: Surely we can talk some sense into him, and tell him his true nature...

monarch.speaker: Point?
monarch.message: Ah I am the only and greatest being in the universe!

choices.text: Fool. Don't you know there is much more to the world! There are dimensions and other beings! How could you possibly be so content to be alone and know nothing?

spherecomment.speaker: Sphere
spherecomment.message: Now listen upon the effect of your harangue on the King of Pointland.

monarchresponse.speaker: King of Pointland
monarchresponse.message: Oh to think! To think! The joy of thinking! How lovely and joyous it is to be!

choices.text: Why is he acting this way?

sphereresponse.speaker: Sphere
sphereresponse.message: He is acting this way because he thinks every word is his own. He does not know of the concept of others. Take this as a lesson in the foolishness of complacency and ignorance. But I now have to admit my error to you. I have recieved fresh insight, and I am now able to explain to you the mysteries of Dimensions above the Third.

choices.text: Ah, so you are not as all-knowing as I had thought.

doYouWish.speaker: Sphere
doYouWish.message: Do you wish for me to teach you what you desired to know at our previous meeting? Or do you wish to insult your Teacher?

choices.text: I beg your forgiveness, Teacher. Please continue.

mysteries.speaker: Sphere
mysteries.message: {The Sphere explains how to construct Extra-Solids by the motion of Solids, and Double Extra-Solids by the motion of Extra-Solids.} Now, you have learned all that you need to know. Go and spread the Gospel of Three Dimensions. I hope that your fellow Flatlanders will be more receptive this time.

choices.text: I am your humble servant, Teacher. I will do as you command.
Will you not aid me in my mission?

seeMe.speaker: Sphere
seeMe.message: You will have to go on without me. You have all you require, and I believe that you will succeed, though I cannot say that you will not suffer for your words by the end of it.

choices.text: I will do as you command, your Lordship.

dreamLeave.speaker: Square
dreamLeave.message: {The Sphere slowly fades from your view, and you find yourself in bed back in your house.}
